=== Joining the Community ===

If you want to get involved with <nowiki>[[UETeam|UE Team]]</nowiki>, you can use the following resources:

==== Homepage ====

You can always access our homepage at https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UETeam

==== Mailing List ====

To be confirmed.

==== IRC ====

Contact on the Freenode IRC network at <code>#ubuntu-ue</code>.

=== Joining the Team ===

If you have any question contact the team via the mailing list or IRC channel listed above.

==== Team Membership ====

Want to become a member of the UE Team?

Sure thing, just sign up to the mailing list, drop in the IRC channel and sign up on the Launchpad Site.

We really need the help!
